api_key.title: API access key
api_key.description: Type your API access key. You can find or create this key on the Configuration/API Access section of the PagerDuty website. [PagerDuty Support article on how to get API Key](https://support.pagerduty.com/hc/en-us/articles/202829310-Generating-an-API-Key).

service_name.title: PagerDuty service name
service_name.description: Type the name of the PagerDuty service to post alerts to. If you want alerts to be posted to a new service, type a new name. PagerDuty will create the service.

user_email.title: Primary contact email
user_email.description: Type the email address of the user to contact when an alert is posted. If you want alerts to be sent to a new email address, type the address and PagerDuty will create a user.

user_phone.title: Primary contact phone number
user_phone.description: Type the phone number of the user to contact when an alert is posted. Include the national code followed by a space and a 10-digit number; for example: +1 1234567890. If you omit the national code, it is set to +1 by default.

escalation-policy.title: PagerDuty service escalation policy
escalation-policy.description: Type the name of the PagerDuty esclation policy used by the service to escalate incidents.
